title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 351.11 - Poultry
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 351.11 - Poultry

State Regulations

All poultry presented for admission to a fair: (a) shall be accompanied by results of a
negative pullorum typhoid test conducted within 90 days prior to the opening
date of the fair or originate directly from a U.S. pullorum-typhoid clean or
equivalent flock. Waterfowl are exempt from this requirement. Pullorum test
negative poultry shall be identified by official leg band. Poultry originating
from a status flock shall be accompanied by proof of status. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
351.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
